title: Mike Africa Interview and more
itunes:title: Mike Africa Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had some flashback to some classic interivews such as Mike Epps and Wanda Sykes where they spoke about 'The Upshaws', New Comedy Landscape and learning from each other. We also flashed back to the time Jo Koy stopped by and spoke about Mental Health, Being Subject To Racism, New Book 'Mixed Plate' and more. We also, flashed back to the time Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Derrick Jaxn for not only embarrassing his wife but being a narcissist. However it wasn't all classics as we also had Mike Africa who discussed The 1978 Police Raid On The MOVE Group & The Fight To Exonerate His Parents.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
